statements: SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_research_publications
SELECT title, author FROM nanotechnology_research_publications
SELECT author, published_date FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT title, published_date FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE published_date>'2021-01-01'
SELECT publication_id, author, abstract FROM nanotechnology_research_publications ORDER BY publication_id DESC
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT publication_id, title, author, published_date FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, abstract FROM nanotechnology_research_publications WHERE title LIKE '%nanotechnology%' AND author = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY publication_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_table WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, authors FROM metadata_table ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, keywords FROM metadata_table WHERE publication_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM documentation_table WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT document_content FROM documentation_table WHERE publication_id = 3;
SELECT publication_title, publication_date, authors FROM metadata_table ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT publication_title, authors, keywords FROM metadata_table WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT publication_title, abstract FROM metadata_table WHERE publication_title LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT m.publication_title, d.document_content FROM metadata_table m JOIN documentation_table d ON m.publication_id = d.publication_id;
SELECT publication_title, authors, keywords FROM metadata_table WHERE authors @> ARRAY['John Doe'];
SELECT * FROM publications_metadata;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications_metadata WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, abstract FROM publications_metadata ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications_metadata WHERE title ILIKE '%database%';
SELECT publication_id, title, publication_date FROM publications_metadata WHERE publication_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors, publication_date, abstract FROM publications_metadata WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC, title ASC

SELECT distinct authors[1] as first_author, count(author_id) as num_publications FROM publications_metadata JOIN publication_authors ON publication_authors.author_id = any(publications_metadata.authors) GROUP BY first_author HAVING num_publications > 5 ORDER BY num_publications DESC
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications_metadata UNION SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM publication_authors ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT title, array_length(authors, 1) as num_authors FROM publications_metadata WHERE array_length(authors, 1) > 3 ORDER BY num_authors DESC, title ASC
SELECT publication_id, title, publication_date, abstract FROM publications_metadata WHERE abstract ilike '%machine learning%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT * FROM nanotech_publications
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_year FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_year > 2010
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_abstract FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_author = 'John Doe'
SELECT publication_title, publication_keywords FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_keywords LIKE '%nanotechnology%'
SELECT * FROM publication_authors WHERE author_affiliation = 'University X'
SELECT * FROM nanotech_publications
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_year > 2010

SELECT publication_id, publication_category.category_name, publication_title FROM nanotech_publications JOIN publication_categories ON nanotech_publications.publication_id = publication_categories.category_id
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_keywords LIKE '%nanotechnology%'
SELECT publication_title, publication_author, publication_year FROM nanotech_publications WHERE publication_author = 'John Doe'
SELECT publication_id, title, authors FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, affiliation, research_area FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Artificial Intelligence';
SELECT journal_name, publisher, impact_factor FROM journals WHERE impact_factor > 5.0;
SELECT citation_id, citing_publication_id, cited_publication_id, citation_date FROM citations WHERE citation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT keyword_name FROM keywords ORDER BY keyword_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT publication_id, title, authors[1] AS main_author FROM publications WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(authors) >= 2;
SELECT publication_id, title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Data Science';
